premiere.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the first public performance of a film, play, or piece of music
premiere.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Rossini’s work had its premiere at the Paris Opera.
the play’s world premiere  (=the first performance in the world)
premiere.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the first time a product, especially a film or television show, is seen by the public
premiere.translation[1].definitions[0].e: In its premiere episode, the half-hour show had 7.4 million viewers.
